movie_dataset.tagline: Were off to see the Wizard, the wonderful Wizard of Oz!
movie_dataset.overview: Young Dorothy finds herself in a magical world where she makes friends with a lion, a scarecrow and a tin man as they make their way along the yellow brick road to talk with the Wizard and ask for the things they miss most in their lives. The Wicked Witch of the West is the only thing that could stop them.

movie_dataset.tagline: If they lived in the same century, theyd be perfect for each other.
movie_dataset.overview: When her scientist ex-boyfriend discovers a portal to travel through time -- and brings back a 19th-century nobleman named Leopold to prove it -- a skeptical Kate reluctantly takes responsibility for showing Leopold the 21st century. The more time Kate spends with Leopold, the harder she falls for him. But if he doesnt return to his own time, his absence will forever alter history.

movie_dataset.tagline: Its a wonderful laugh! Its a wonderful love!
movie_dataset.overview: A holiday favourite for generations...  George Bailey has spent his entire life giving to the people of Bedford Falls.  All that prevents rich skinflint Mr. Potter from taking over the entire town is Georges modest building and loan company.  But on Christmas Eve the businesss $8,000 is lost and Georges troubles begin.
A Broadway artiste turns a faded film stars comeback vehicle into an artsy flop.

movie_dataset.tagline: It only takes one witness to spoil the perfect crime.
movie_dataset.overview: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.
